block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: Thanks for 300+ subscribers!! Learn how to fold an Origami Squirrel designed by John Montroll in this video. Less than a minute origami. Enjoy!!! Here at Heap Art, we are trying to help you practice origami on a regular bases. Every week I will select a minimum of 2 origami models and show you how to fold it. If you like origami and paper airplanes -- Please use the following link to subscribe to my channel: https://www.youtube.com/c/heapart?sub_confirmation=1 My Upload Schedule: Tuesday : A new Paper Airplane, part of my 100 Exotic Paper Airplane Challenge Friday : A new Origami Model never seen before on my channel

block_list.title: More Designs from John Montroll
block_list.body:
• Angelfish by John Montroll
  • Bull by John Montroll
  • Squirrel by John Montroll
